attributes.action: Implement a moratorium on second home expenses pending establishment of new rules and codes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
mplement a moratorium on second home expenses pending establishment of new rules and code and set up an independent review board to audit the expense claims of MPs over the last 5 years and where the claims are deemed to be outside the 'spirit' of the rules, a return of the amounts from the relevant MP.

Also, to demand those guilty no longer hide behind the phrase 'it was within the rules' but to admit they milked the corrupt system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
